## Producer class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Producer writes a message to a kafka topic The request will block until the message is written to all ISR. Therefore the respose will contain the partition and offset of the message. This is used to achive at-least-once deliverability guarantee.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Producer implements ProduceMessages 
```
<b>Implements:</b> ProduceMessages
